# Capsule Note - Letters to Your Future Self

> A privacy-first platform for writing heartfelt letters to your future self, delivered via email or physical mail.

## About Capsule Note

Capsule Note helps people write meaningful letters to their future selves. Whether it's a New Year's resolution, a graduation message, a letter of encouragement during tough times, or a legacy letter for loved ones - we deliver your words when they matter most.

## Key Features

- **Scheduled Email Delivery**: Write today, receive when you choose - 1 month, 1 year, 5 years, or any date
- **Physical Mail Delivery**: Premium option to receive your letter as a beautiful printed keepsake
- **End-to-End Encryption**: Your letters are encrypted so only you can read them
- **Multi-language Support**: Available in English and Turkish

## Privacy & Security

We take privacy seriously:
- AES-256-GCM encryption for all letter content
- We cannot read your letters - only you can
- No selling of personal data
- GDPR compliant with data export and deletion

## Technical Information

- Platform: Web application (responsive design)
- Stack: Next.js, React, TypeScript
- Hosting: Vercel (US/EU)
- Database: PostgreSQL with encryption at rest
- Email: Resend (transactional email)
- Physical Mail: Lob (US postal service integration)
